articles.author: Ali Asgar Nalwala
articles.title: Asian Shooting Championships 2023: Anish Bhanwala obtains Paris 2024 Olympic quota for India - Olympics
articles.description: Anish Bhanwala secured a Paris 2024 Olympic quota for India in the men’s 25m rapid fire pistol at the Asian Shooting Championships 2023. He also won a bronze medal in the event.
articles.content:
Indian shooter Anish Bhanwala won the bronze medal in the mens 25m rapid fire pistol event at the Asian Shooting Championships 2023 in Changwon, the Republic of Korea on Monday.
